description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Merging old school graphics with modern game play, Splitfire lets you fly one of five WWII fighter planes. Fight wave after wave of German fighters and bombers to collect gold to upgrade your planes.
description.short: Merging old school graphics with modern game play, Splitfire lets you fly one of five WWII fighter planes. Fight wave after wave of German fighters and bombers to collect gold to upgrade your planes.
